segments.text: As I watch the boy, I'm struck by how determined he looks reaching into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little face is a mixture of concentration and sheer delight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But, I also feel a pang of disgust thinking about the mess that could result if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling everywhere, and I can't shake the thought of the damage it could cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesnâ€™t seem to care about the puddle at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she'd notice the little accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a beautiful day outside, yet this kitchen feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR
